About Configuring a Virtual Network using the Management Portal

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block:
- **DNS SERVERS:** Enter the DNS server name and IP address that you want to use for name resolution. Typically this would be a DNS server that you use for on-premises name resolution. This setting does not create a DNS server. For the example in this tutorial, type **YourDNS** for the name and **10.1.0.4** for the IP address. - **Configure Point-To-Site VPN:** Leave this field blank. - **Configure Site-To-Site VPN:** Select checkbox. - **LOCAL NETWORK:** Select **Specify a New Local Network** from the drop-down list.
![](./media/virtual-networks-create-site-to-site-cross-premises-connectivity/CreateCrossVNet_03_DNSServersandVPNConnectivity.png)
